map.name: Rallypoint Alpha
map.objective: Capture hills to connect your team's two bases together

pages.page:
`cÂ» `lHOW TO PLAY`0
Each team has two Outposts located diagonally.
Capture adjacent hills to connect them.
Create a chain of connected hills between each of your Outposts to claim the Rallypoint.

apply.message: You cannot enter the enemy spawn!
You cannot enter the enemy spawn!

broadcasts.tip: Capture towers to connect your team's Outposts together
Connecting your Outposts will give your team control of the Rallypoint increasing your score
Steal enemy controlled towers to break the connection between their Outposts
